title: Remove branch management links to streamline Development Task interface
description: Clean up the Development Task UI by removing Branch, PR created and ready for development, and Rebase links that create visual noise and complexity, resulting in a simplified interface that focuses users on essential task management activities
iWant: to remove Branch, PR created, and Rebase links from the Development Task interface
soThat: I can work with a simple and clean task management interface without distracting branch management elements
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is removed from Development Task UI
PR created and ready for development link is eliminated
Rebase link is removed from the interface
Development Task functionality remains fully operational
